sentences.en: Deep ditch, single drawbridge, massive stone walls, eight at towers, cannon, muskets, fire and smoke.
sentences.cn: 深深的壕堑, 单吊桥, 厚重的石壁, 八座巨大的塔楼.大炮 、 毛瑟枪 、 火焰与烟雾.

sentences.en: Deep ditches, double drawbridge , massive stone walls, eight great towers, cannon, muskets, fire and smoke.
sentences.cn: 深深的壕堑 、 双重的吊桥 、 厚重的石壁 、 八座巨大的塔楼.大炮 、 毛瑟枪 、 火焰与烟雾.

sentences.en: Hearing the wheels on the drawbridge, Puss in Boots hastened out.
sentences.cn: 听见吊桥上车轮的声音，穿靴子的猫急忙跑了出来。

sentences.en: Please keep a firm grasp on the cable when crossing the drawbridge.
sentences.cn: 过吊桥的时候请大家用手抓紧绳缆.

sentences.en: That's a drawbridge which is swing but not falling.
sentences.cn: 那是摇曳而不墬的吊桥.

sentences.en: The chains clanked as the drawbridge opened.
sentences.cn: 吊桥放下时,铁链发出叮当声.

sentences.en: The king commanded the guards to raise the drawbridge.
sentences.cn: 国王命令卫兵升起吊桥.

sentences.en: The old security model was for IT to build a big mote around the corporate network and only let trusted, authorized employees come across the well-guarded drawbridge and into the proverbial castle.
sentences.cn: IT旧的安全模型是在企业网络周围建立一刻巨大的微尘，只让受信任的、已授权的员工穿越守卫严密的吊桥墙进入众所周知的城堡。

sentences.en: Try to destroy your opponents drawbridge and at the same time defend yours.
sentences.cn: 现在你要努力去破坏对手的吊桥同时保护好自己的. 好好利用你的魔法盾!

sentences.en: With few other tourists for company, we charged around the ramparts, stampeded across the drawbridge and did battle on the, um, battlements - the setting was so filmic, it was hard to resist the urge.
sentences.cn: 几乎没有别的游人同行，我们冲破壁垒，穿越吊桥，在城墙上战斗——背景真像在电影里一样，我们拟制不住模仿一番的冲动。

trans.tran_en: a bridge that can be pulled up to stop people from entering a castle, or to let ships pass
